enemies.name: Acidic
enemies.description: Each turn converts a healing potion into acid, which damages you when collected.

enemies.name: Alchemist
enemies.description: Converts two tiles into something else each turn.

enemies.name: Alpha
enemies.description: Pulls nearby skulls into the tiles around itself each turn.

enemies.name: Armoured
enemies.description: Can only be damaged if the path reaches one of the three squares above it.

enemies.name: Assassin
enemies.description: Deals double attack damage each turn when on the bottom row.
enemies.mortal_enemy_effect: Automatically moves down one tile each turn.

enemies.name: Boss
enemies.description: A standard skull with much higher stats.

enemies.name: Brute
enemies.description: Throws a regular skull at you each turn, damaging you by that skullâ€™s health.

enemies.name: Chaotic
enemies.description: Jumps to a random tile each turn, destroying whatever it lands on.
enemies.mortal_enemy_effect: Can only be damaged by uppercuts.

enemies.name: Corrosive
enemies.description: Prevents armor repair while alive.
enemies.mortal_enemy_effect: Reduces your defense to 0 when it appears.

enemies.name: Devourer
enemies.description: Destroys a random upgrade every four turns.

enemies.name: Doppelganger
enemies.description: Matches your current defense value each turn.

enemies.name: Flaming
enemies.description: Ignites all surrounding tiles; burning tiles damage you when matched.

enemies.name: Fleeing
enemies.description: Moves up one tile every turn and deals damage whenever pushed down.

enemies.name: Freezing
enemies.description: Freezes two random tiles each turn; frozen tiles cannot be matched.
enemies.mortal_enemy_effect: Halves your base damage while it lives.

enemies.name: Golden
enemies.description: Defeat before its countdown ends to gain ~40 gold; otherwise it vanishes.

enemies.name: Greasy
enemies.description: Shifts all other skulls down one row each turn.

enemies.name: Kamikaze
enemies.description: Explodes when its timer ends, dealing half your health as damage.

enemies.name: Invisible
enemies.description: Has high defense but low health; poison is especially effective.
enemies.mortal_enemy_effect: Other skulls spawn with double armor.

enemies.name: Mage
enemies.description: Prevents skill cooldowns from recharging naturally.

enemies.name: Magnetic
enemies.description: Pulls swords and shields into adjacent tiles each turn.

enemies.name: Meat Shield
enemies.description: Redirects all damage from other skulls to itself while alive.

enemies.name: Lich
enemies.description: Transforms into a phylactery when killed; match coins on it or it revives.

enemies.name: Overseer
enemies.description: Converts one sword into a skull each turn.

enemies.name: Poisonous
enemies.description: Poison persists while this skull lives; extra poison applied by enemy attacks.

enemies.name: Regular
enemies.description: The common foe encountered throughout the dungeon.

enemies.name: Spiked
enemies.description: Reflects the full amount of damage you deal to it.

enemies.name: Thief
enemies.description: Steals coin tiles each turn or gold directly from your inventory.
enemies.mortal_enemy_effect: Deals double attack damage when stealing gold.

enemies.name: Trampling
enemies.description: Breaks a random sword or shield each turn, nullifying broken tiles.

enemies.name: Unstable
enemies.description: Replaces all tiles with new ones when its timer expires.
enemies.mortal_enemy_effect: New tiles include skulls and exclude swords.

enemies.name: Vampire
enemies.description: Heals itself for its attack value whenever it hits you.

enemies.name: Vengeful
enemies.description: Gains 1 attack each time you kill another enemy.
